description.body: We have a quick addition to the Patch Notes that was just released, welcome 6.3a!
It’s our 5th birthday and we’re ready to celebrate with you all! Welcome to Patch 6.3, Gilded Glory.
It's the last patch of 6.2 and we have a few quick adjustments for AAA ARAM.
Welcome to patch 6.2k! We’ve been keeping an eye on how the meta has been shaping up and we have a few adjustments to some outlier champions who have been dominating the Rift.
Welcome to the “j” version of 6.2. We wanted to make sure we fit the j theme of this patch so we’re launching 20 new Augments for AAA ARAM including our J series, Sync-Up, and Champions.
We’re making a few adjustments to augments, welcome to patch 6.2i!
Caw caw! Swain’s rework is making its arrival, along with some balance updates.
We hope you’ve studied up on your geometry, because Vel’Koz is making his debut and we have some updates to AAA ARAM.
We’re nearing the end of our 6.2 patch cycle and after keeping a close eye on the jungle, there are a few adjustments we’re making.
This patch we’re striking a balance between revving up some of our underperformers and cooling off the overachievers. Welcome to Patch 6.2e!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2d - Adventure Modes

description.body: We’re launching some new Augments and making a few adjustments for AAA ARAM.

This patch we’re zeroing in on sharpening some champion identities and adjusting their power curves across all stages of the game. As well as nerfing some champions who have been dominating the game. Welcome to Patch 6.2c!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2c - Adventure Mode Hotfix

description.body: AAA ARAM has been out for a few days and we have a couple of adjustments to the mode!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2b - Main & Adventure Modes

description.body: We’re grooooovin’ right on into Patch 6.2b. We’ve made a handful of balance changes, the return of AAA ARAM, Arena, ARURF as well as the launch of Space Groove Lux!
We’re hot off the tails of our big 6.2 update! We made a lot of changes, so we’re following up with some needed balance changes.
Aurora makes her arrival, marksmen get some sharp updates, our Player Behavior System is here, and soooo much more! Welcome to Patch 6.2
Welcome to Patch 6.1e, we’re updating some of our Adventure Modes.
Tick, tick, boom! Zilean makes his debut this patch, along with a new Wild Pass, Companion, and Balance Patch. Welcome to Patch 6.1d.
With the recent launch of Adventure’s Star, we’re making a few adjustments to AAA ARAM & Arena.
Garen rework, Black Market Mayhem, and balance changes— welcome to Patch 6.1b.
Gaze up at the stars and enjoy all the goodies and fun that Patch 6.1 has to offer!
It’s the last patch of 6.0, and we’re spilling the tea on the latest balance changes before we head into Patch 6.1!
Grab your purplest pj’s, your hammer, and swing into patch 6.0d with the arrivals of Pajama Guardian Lulu and Poppy!
We’ve got a bogey on our tail! Corki’s rework, the launch of Gnar, balance changes, and more. Welcome to Patch 6.0c!
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0b
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0a
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0
A few balance changes for the last patch of 2024
Experience a reworked Singed and the new Showdown mode in Wild Rift Patch 5.3c.
How are we feeling after the Arcane Season 2 premiere? But there is no time to rest because we have a brand new game mode for you!
Look out! A Warlord behind you!
Heimerdinger has arrived!
Look out, Kayle is back and better than ever!
Sharpen your claws and jump into action!
The Iron Revenant has arrived!
How is it still chilly in here? Who's leaving these ice shards around?
New Rift, New champion, New skins, New items. Whatever you’re looking for, we got it with patch 5.2!
We are in the homerun of patch 5.1 now! Let’s see what we have in store for you.
Look out Maokai saplings incoming!
Spoiler alert we are shipping not one, but two champion reworks this patch! Tune in and check it out.
Come one come all, It’s Viego time.
Join Kalista and sail into Patch Notes 5.1!
Welcome to Patch 5.0c!
Champion changes, item changes, new events, we got it all!
February will be a big month for us, and likewise, we got a big patch for you!

First new patch of the year and it’s gonna be a big one! Hold on to your hats because we got new items, a new champion, new skins, and a TON of gameplay updates. 

Welcome to the first patch of the year, Patch 5.0!
Last patch of the year, are you ready?! We got a Ziggs rework coming your way, plus new skins, new event, and of course, your regularly scheduled balance updates.
This patch is a doozy! Welcome to the first patch of December.
This patch we are sprinting onto the Rift with Sivir! Lots of balance updates coming your way as well. Strap in and welcome to Patch 4.4b!
Raise your hand if you’ve been asking for a certain new item to be looked at! We hear ya. This patch has the champions and items updates you’ve been looking for.
BOO! This patch is full of surprises! Fiddlesticks arrives on the Rift, we’re celebrating our third-year anniversary, the mage update is here, and much more! Welcome to Patch 4.4!
It’s the last patch of the Fighting Spirit Update! We’ve got a rework to Janna, balance updates, and new skins! Welcome to Patch 4.3d!

This patch we’re charging in and bringing Hecarim to the Rift! Everyone’s favorite Star Guardian girlies are also making their return, and we’ve got your regularly scheduled balance updates. Welcome to Patch 4.3c!

We’re taking a look at the meta since our overhaul of the rune system and making some adjustments to some champions who needed some help to find their footing, and those who have been toeing the line. We also have the addition of the Mecha skinline, the return of the Stargazers, and a new Wild Pass! Welcome to Patch 4.3b!
Vladimir joins the fight this patch, Annie’s rework is almost here, ghost Poros, and of course balance updates! Welcome to Patch 4.3a!
We’re celebrating the launch of Soul Fighter with a new mode, event, and skins! Plus we’re revamping our rune system and so much more! Welcome to Patch 4.3—The Fighting Spirit Update!

Welcome to the last balance patch of the Playhem patch! We’re making some more adjustments to marksmen and a few other champions to balance out the meta and groovin’ to the beat with the arrival of Space Groove skins!
Hot off our big marksmen update we’ve got some balance changes, the arrival of two titan brothers, the return of the leaderboard event, and some new skins! Welcome to Patch 4.2a!

This patch we’ve got our bows and arrows ready and are envisioning our way to a chilly victory…with soda pop for the reward! We’ve got the long awaited marksman update, Swain, Ice Dragon, the arrival of a new Wild Pass, and more!
Level up—Welcome to Patch 4.1c! This is the last patch during our High Five update, so we’re coming in hot with some balance updates and the Arcade Promotion and Skins!
Sneaky Sneaky—Welcome to Patch 4.1b! Twitch arrives on the Rift, Ranked S9 is here, and we’re celebrating Nova Esports Icons win!
Pick a card, any card—Welcome to Patch 4.1a! The launch of Ultimate Spell Book, our special April Fools Event, Cosmic skins, and of course balance updates!

Unleash Chemtech power—Welcome to Patch 4.1! Urgot crab walks onto the Rift! Here to save the day or wreck it, Superhero Vi flies into this Wild Pass! We also have the continuation of our updates to the tank role, and balance updates!
Class is in session—Welcome to Patch 4.0c! It's the last balance patch for 4.0! We have some adjustments to a few champions and the release of Battle Academia Leona and Battle Principal Yuumi!
Electrify the Rift—It’s Patch 4.0b! Zeri makes her arrival, along with new PROJECT skins and the PROJECT: SURGE event! Two game modes return, and balance updates across the Rift!
We’re launching two new mechanics, base burning and inhibitor respawns as well as balance updates across the Rift! Welcome to Patch 4.0a!

It’s time zip and zap into Wild Rift’s first patch of the year! Zoe makes her debut, All Random Ultra Rapid Fire (ARURF) mode returns, Lunar New Year celebrations, Ranked S8, a new Wild Pass, and much more! Welcome to Patch 4.0!

Oh deer, it’s the last patch of the year! Welcome to 3.5b! Never fear, there’s still plenty to fawn over this with the arrival of Lillia, an adventure into the spirit realm, snowball fights with our favorite poro pals, and of course some balance updates!
ChromaCrash Samira, Jinx, and Ekko make their arrival. We also have balance updates across the Rift, including some for One For All—Welcome to Patch 3.5a!

Slip through the shadows and slash your opponents with Kayn and Aatrox! Play as 5 Yuumi’s and pounce all over your foes in the new game mode One For All! We also have new items, runes, balance changes, as well as updates to the jungle! Welcome to Patch 3.5!

It’s time for the last balance patch of 3.4! Hunt down your foes and wreak havoc in the jungle, when we unleash Warwick onto the Rift this patch! We also have some balance updates before we close out 3.4 and head into 3.5!
Vex makes her arrival, balance updates across the Rift, and it’s time to start your training arc—Welcome to Patch 3.4b!

It’s time for the Power Spike Party! While we’re ready to celebrate with some goodies, we’re also making some adjustments to the support quest items, Gwen and some other champions across the map. Welcome to 3.4a!

You’ll be a cut above the rest when Gwen and Yone join the Rift this patch…just be careful when you’re out there running around with scissors and fighting your inner demons. We also have a new game mode, items, enchants, Wild Pass, and loads more. Welcome to Patch 3.4!
It’s our final balance before Patch 3.4, and we’re focused on making adjustments to some champions who have been dominating and struggling in the Baron Lane. Welcome to Patch 3.3c!
